actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the amounts of certain loans canceled under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act as the result of disaster losses.

summary.text: Excludes from gross income, under the Internal Revenue Code, the amounts of loans cancelled under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act as the result of disaster losses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the amounts of certain loans canceled under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act as the result of disaster losses.
